NomaiObject:
<color=orange> we are clowns in a circus </color>
1
OENO: Daz, the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction is progressing swiftly thanks to your voyager stones. I hope you will visit us soon to see our work!
2 1
DAZ: What terrific news! Cassava is here with me right now. Would you like to voyage with me to the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> to visit our friends, my love?
3 2
CASSAVA: I would love to, love. I have no doubt that
4 2
DAZ: What was that? Cassava.. What.. What did we just experience?!
5 4
OENO: What happened? Are both of you alright?
6 5
CASSAVA: We are well, Oeno.. I am unsure what occurred - but when I stepped into the projection pool Daz was using to voyage, both of us felt.. coterminous!
7 6
DAZ: What a strange quirk of this new technology.. Though it pains me to say so, it is tragically clear that there is much more work to do before my voyager stones are ready to be released!
WorkshopTop EX6 7
